entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:11 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 08:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: -37.0°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -40.7°C
Wind: WNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 54 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
